name: Digital Retaw
description:
Digital Retaw - The game where anything's possible is a Twine-based digital adaptation of a non-digital card game I made a few years ago, called The Ideas of Retaw.

It's a local co-op game where you use unconventional resources to solve the world's biggest problems, and challenge yourself to create more useful and innovative ideas than your fellow Retaw citizens.

It can be used solo as a "Resource and Mission" generator, or can be played with as many as 16 people and will adapt to match the numbers. I'd recommend somewhere between 6-10 people for the best playing experience.

This game was made for #onegameamonth #1GAM April 2017.
